title: About skills
text: - Here you can find non-class skills added in Sanctuary of Exile
- For vanilla skills, please refer to [Vanilla PD2 Wiki](https://wiki.projectdiablo2.com/wiki/Main_Page)

title: Frailty
text: Frailty is a new aura that reduces enemy physical resistance:
- Reduces enemy physical resistance - starts at 10% and receives 1% additional reduction per level

title: Rimefall
text: Shoot forth cold enchanted arrow that leave a wave of rimefall behind, dealing cold damage to enemies:
- Converts 50% physical damage to elemental damage

title: Reinforce
text: New defensive skill that allows scaling of %PDR, flat PDR and MDR with base defence:
- scales of BASE defense from items + bonus from dexterity - this means that any % enhanced defense is not taken into account
- Gain 2 physical damage reduction per base defense according to formula
- Gain 1% physical damage reduction per base defense according to formula
- Gain 2 magic damage reduction per base defense according to formula
